if [ $(rfkill list wifi | grep "Soft blocked: yes" | wc -l) -gt 0 ] ; then
    rfkill unblock wifi
    zenity --info --text "Enabled wireless"
else
    rfkill block wifi
    zenity --info --text "Disabled wireless"
fi
